name: Flippt
description:
Overview
Flippt is a highly addictive, casual puzzle game.

The concept is simple: you are shown a sequence of gems and then repeat that sequence by flipping the tiles below. If you succeed you move on to the next, more difficult, level. Sound too easy? Don't be deceived. Flippt is easy to learn, yet difficult to master.

See how many levels you can reach then try to beat your fastest time!

Key Features
  • Highly Addictive Gameplay
  • Unlimited Number Of Levels
  • Test Your Memory
  • Use Boosts To Help You Progress
  • Progressively Harder Gameplay Always Gives A Challenge
  • Easy To Learn, Difficult To Master
